name: Torpedo Attack!
description:
25th GDL Game Jam

Theme : Oxygen

Take the role of a submarine commander and break through the enemy lines! Avoid patrol ships, duel other submarines, and attempt to deal a decisive blow to the enemy fleet! Don't forget to surface and replenish your oxygen supplies.

Controls

  • W/S - Ascend and Descend
  • D - Fire Torpedo
  • A - Detonate Torpedo
  • R - Sonar Scan

Team

  • Reg Chou - Art
  • James Lee - Programming, Music
